message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,600,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for our discussion.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1,600,000 is well above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for this product.  This is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1,600,000 represents the high end of its value, I understand your perspective.  I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000.  I believe this price reflects the true worth of this product and its potential for you.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $1,400,000 is still a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000.  I believe this price is fair considering the potential of this product and my budget.
